languages.text: Примерно через три вахты после предполагаемого исчезновения команды шаттла из-за двери, за которой находится зеркало, начали доноситься странные звуки — хлюпанье, треск — и причудливые запахи.
About three watches after the shuttle crew's disappearance, strange squelching and snapping sounds are heard coming from the mirror compartment, accompanied by a putrid odour.
languages.original_text: Примерно через три вахты после предполагаемого исчезновения команды шаттла из-за двери, за которой находится зеркало, начали доноситься странные звуки — хлюпанье, треск — и причудливые запахи.

traits.locale_text: About a day later after the shuttle crew's supposed disappearance, unearthly squishy noises and weird crackling sounds, along with terrible smell started coming out from inside the compartment.
About a day later after the shuttle crew's supposed disappearance, unearthly squishy noises and weird crackling sounds, along with terrible smell started coming out from inside the compartment.
About a day after the shuttle crew's supposed disappearance, out of the same compartment crew members encounter unearthly squishing and crackling noises, along with a putrid odour.
About three watches after the shuttle crew's disappearance, strange squelching and snapping sounds are heard coming from the mirror compartment, accompanied by a putrid odour.
About a day after the shuttle crew's disappearance, strange squelching and snapping sounds are heard coming from the mirror compartment, accompanied by a putrid odour.
About three watches after the shuttle crew's disappearance, strange squelching and snapping sounds are heard coming from the mirror compartment, accompanied by a putrid odour.

languages.text: 在穿梭机机组人员失踪的三巡过后，船员们听到装着镜子的舱室传来了古怪的挤压声与断裂声，舱室里还散发出了腐臭的味道。
languages.original_text: About three watches after the shuttle crew's disappearance, strange squelching and snapping sounds are heard coming from the mirror compartment, accompanied by a putrid odour.

traits.locale_text: 在穿梭机机组人员失踪的三巡过后，船员们听到装着镜子的舱室传来了古怪的挤压声与断裂声，舱室里还散发出了腐臭的味道。

languages.text: Unas tres guardias después de la desaparición del equipo de la lanzadera, se oyen unos chapoteos y chasquidos extraños procedentes del compartimento del espejo, acompañados poco después de un olor putrefacto.
languages.original_text: About three watches after the shuttle crew's disappearance, strange squelching and snapping sounds are heard coming from the mirror compartment, accompanied by a putrid odour.

traits.locale_text: Unas tres guardias después de la desaparición del equipo de la lanzadera, se oyen unos chapoteos y chasquidos extraños procedentes del compartimento del espejo, acompañados poco después de un olor putrefacto.

languages.text: シャトルクルーの失踪から約3時間後、鏡のある区画室から腐敗臭とともに軋むような奇妙な音が聞こえてきた。
languages.original_text: About three watches after the shuttle crew's disappearance, strange squelching and snapping sounds are heard coming from the mirror compartment, accompanied by a putrid odour.

traits.locale_text: シャトルクルーの失踪から約3時間後、鏡のある区画室から腐敗臭とともに軋むような奇妙な音が聞こえてきた。

languages.text: Etwa drei Wachschichten nach dem Verschwinden der Shuttlecrew ertönen aus dem Spiegelmodul merkwürdig schmatzende und knackende Geräusche, begleitet von einem grauenhaften Gestank.
languages.original_text: About three watches after the shuttle crew's disappearance, strange squelching and snapping sounds are heard coming from the mirror compartment, accompanied by a putrid odour.

traits.locale_text: Etwa drei Wachschichten nach dem Verschwinden der Shuttlecrew ertönen aus dem Spiegelmodul merkwürdig schmatzende und knackende Geräusche, begleitet von einem grauenhaften Gestank.

languages.text: Environ trois quarts après la disparition de l'équipage de la navette, d'étranges craquements et bruits gluants se font entendre dans le compartiment du miroir, accompagnés d'une odeur putride.
languages.original_text: About three watches after the shuttle crew's disappearance, strange squelching and snapping sounds are heard coming from the mirror compartment, accompanied by a putrid odour.

traits.locale_text: Environ trois quarts après la disparition de l'équipage de la navette, d'étranges craquements et bruits gluants se font entendre dans le compartiment du miroir, accompagnés d'une odeur putride.

languages.text: Mekik mürettebatının kayboluşundan yaklaşık üç saat sonra aynalı kompartımandan garip gıcırtı ve çıtırtı sesleri geliyor, bunlara bir de bir çürük kokusu eşlik ediyor.
languages.original_text: About three watches after the shuttle crew's disappearance, strange squelching and snapping sounds are heard coming from the mirror compartment, accompanied by a putrid odour.
